title: Equinox Seeks Capital Ahead of Plans to Go Public
sub_head: Fitness company wants to raise between $300 million and $500 million in preferred equity; trends for sector improving as more people head back to the gym
body:
Equinox Group LLC is sounding out investors as it seeks to raise fresh funds ahead of plans to take the company public, according to people familiar with the matter.
The New York-based gym chain is working with Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to help it raise preferred equity, the people said. Equinox wants to raise between $300 million and $500 million in this round, one of the people said.
Equinox...
